node.title: Super Rugby Pacific: Crusaders vs Blues
node.description: Blues are taking home a win against Crusaders after a top of the table clash in Christchurch tonight.
node.content:
["The Blues have held on for a historic 27-23 victory over the Crusaders in Christchurch.", "", "
\nPhoto: PhotoSport / John Davidson\n
", "The Crusaders made a spirited come back in the second half and looked like snatching victory several times in the final ten minutes, before the Blues prevailed for their first win in Christchurch since 2004.", "The Blues now lead the Super Rugby Pacific competition, with 7 wins from 8 games.", "Read back on the game below:"]
